title: Thrive: The Evolution of a Game (Video Game Analysis)

media:group.media:title: Thrive: The Evolution of a Game (Video Game Analysis)
media:group.media:description:
In which I examine the past, present and future of an evolution game forged from the ashes of Spore and perhaps destined for the stars.

Thrive website: https://revolutionarygamesstudio.com/

Download the Thrive launcher: https://github.com/Revolutionary-Games/Thrive-Launcher/releases/latest
Download Thrive manually: https://github.com/Revolutionary-Games/Thrive/releases/latest
Get Thrive on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1779200/Thrive/
Get Thrive on itch.io: https://revolutionarygames.itch.io/thrive
Set up a Thrive development environment: https://github.com/Revolutionary-Games/Thrive/blob/master/doc/setup_instructions.md
Support Thrive on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thrivegame

Thrive community forum: https://community.revolutionarygamesstudio.com/
Join the Thrive community Discord: https://discord.gg/FZxDQ4H
Thrive subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/thrive/
Apply to join the team: https://revolutionarygamesstudio.com/get-involved/

Get the Microbe Stage soundtrack on Bandcamp: https://revolutionarygames.bandcamp.com/album/thrive-microbe-stage-soundtrack
Get the rest of my Thrive music on Bandcamp (new album!): https://oliverlugg.bandcamp.com/album/thrive-soundtrack-complete-oliver-lugg-collection

This video is a partial adaptation of the following articles I wrote in 2016 and 2018 respectively:
https://oliverlugg.com/the-impossible-game/
https://oliverlugg.com/thrive-a-memoir/

Thrive developer wiki: https://wiki.revolutionarygamesstudio.com/wiki/Main_Page
Thrive community wiki: https://thrive.fandom.com/wiki/Thrive_Wiki

Join my Discord server to discuss this video and more: https://discord.gg/AVcU9w5gVW

0:00 Intro
2:35 Part I: How to Microbe
17:27 Part II: On the Origin of Thrive
32:43 Part III: The Impossible Game
45:20 Credits
